definitions.example: Our cat loves to play with a small wad of paper.
With a wad of cash like that, she should not have been walking round Manhattan

definitions.definition: A soft plug or seal, particularly as used between the powder and pellets in a shotgun cartridge, or earlier on the charge of a muzzleloader or cannon.
To crumple or crush into a compact, amorphous shape or ball.
definitions.example: She wadded up the scrap of paper and threw it in the trash.

definitions.definition: To insert or force a wad into.
To stuff or line with some soft substance, or wadding, like cotton.
Any black manganese oxide or hydroxide mineral rich rock in the oxidized zone of various ore deposits.
